EmailTemplate.description: Email of acknowledgement for demographic change request to be saved as copy on case
EmailTemplate.name: BCBS NM Acknowledgement Case Copy
EmailTemplate.subject: BCBS of New Mexico Demographic Change Request Form Received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Name_Submitter__c} ({!Case.Title_Submitter__c}), Thank you for contacting Blue Cross and Blue Shield of New Mexico. This email is confirmation we have received your request, case number {!Case.CaseNumber}, for {!Case.Name_of_Provider_Group__c}. Your request may take up to 30 days to complete. Once completed, a notification will be sent to the email address submitted with the Demographic Change Request Form.
To check on the status of your request or for any questions, contact 1-800-567-8540 or contact your Network Representative. Sincerely,
Blue Cross and Blue Shield of New Mexico
(For Internal Purpose only : ref: {!Case.Thread_Id})
